subject: Article on a testing pattern
msgSnippet: JUnit users, I have written an article in which I describe a Testing Pattern which I call AbstractTest.  The basic idea is to maximize reuse of tests written
messageBody:
JUnit users,
I have written an article in which I describe a Testing Pattern which
I call AbstractTest. The basic idea is to maximize reuse of tests
written for an interface for every implementation of the interface.

I have been using this technique for a while to good effect, but I would
love to to get some feedback from this group on the issue. I am
especially interested to hear about other approaches that people have
used to accomplish the same goals.

Read the full article here
http://www.placebosoft.com/abstract-test.html

See and contribute to the "pattern-only" version at the Portland Pattern
Repository, here
http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?AbstractTest

--
Eric George
